name: hoodoo
content:
hoodoo noun
(MAGIC)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ U ] a set of magical beliefs and practices that originally belonged to West Africans brought to North America and the Caribbean as slaves, which are linked to the religion of voodoo: Haitian folklore told tales of dead people whose bodies were awakened by hoodoo. Compare
voodoo
[ C or U ] informal bad luck that affects someone for a long time, or something that is believed to cause this: Might this be the year that the team finally ends its hoodoo? Some believe there's a hoodoo over England whenever we play Australia at Lord's cricket ground.
[ U ] informal a magical or mysterious power over other people: He thought this was some sort of feminine hoodoo.

hoodoo noun
(ROCK)
[ C ] US a vertical piece of rock that has been made into an interesting shape by wind, water, etc.: The trail winds through a landscape of hoodoos and sandstone cliffs.
